de.hu.berlin.wbi.objects

Class MutationValidation

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hu.berlin.wbi.objects.MutationMention
      • de.hu.berlin.wbi.objects.MutationValidation

  • public class MutationValidation
extends MutationMention
    This object represents a MutationMention from the validation corpus, where we already know which dbSNP entry is associated with this gene. Therefore this class can be used to evaluate precision, recall and F1 for any normalization method.

    • Nested Class Summary
